title: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code This error occurred when running tests `cargo test --all --all-features` for [foundry](https://github.com/foundry-rs/foundry) at commit `249538faaaee2d916b656829fdd82815d4c46a55` According to the error message, the panic is at the `Ok(())` in the code snippet below. Unfortunately, my lack of Rust knowledge prevents me from providing any further guidance here. I'm happy to help troubleshoot / respond to any questions. ```Rust #[doc(hidden)] #[macro_export] macro_rules! clone_resetable { (( $($params: tt)* ) $ty: ty) => { impl<$($params)*> ResetStream for $ty where Self: StreamOnce { type Checkpoint = Self; fn checkpoint(&self) -> Self { self.clone() } #[inline] fn reset(&mut self, checkpoint: Self) -> Result<(), Self::Error> { *self = checkpoint; Ok(()) } } } } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (bd39bbb4b 2023-02-07) binary: rustc commit-hash: bd39bbb4bb92df439bf6d85470e296cc6a47ffbd commit-date: 2023-02-07 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling ethers-contract v1.0.2 (https://github.com/gakonst/ethers-rs#806af08f) error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(WithOptConstParam { did: DefId(0:3469 ~ combine[f3ba]::stream::{impl#47}::reset), const_param_did: None }) (after phase change to runtime-optimized) at bb0[2]: encountered `Assign((_0, const Result::<(), StringStreamError>::Ok(())))` with incompatible types: left-hand side has type: Result<(), <&str as StreamOnce>::Error> right-hand side has type: Result<(), StringStreamError> --> /Users/nick/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/combine-4.6.6/src/stream/mod.rs:44:17 | 44 | Ok(()) | ^^^^^^ ... 153 | clone_resetable! {('a) &'a str} | ------------------------------- in this macro invocation | = note: delayed at 0: std::backtrace::Backtrace::create 1: std::backtrace::Backtrace::force_capture 2: ::emit_diagnostic 3: ::delay_span_bug:: 4: ::fail:: 5: ::visit_statement 6: ::run_pass 7: rustc_mir_transform::pass_manager::run_passes_inner 8: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 9: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 10: ::optimized_mir 11: ::encode_crate_root 12: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 13: rustc_data_structures::sync::join:: 14: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 15: rustc_metadata::fs::encode_and_write_metadata 16: rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen 17: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 18: ::ongoing_codegen 19: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 20: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 21: >::set::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 22: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 23: <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 24: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start 25: __pthread_start = note: this error: internal compiler error originates in the macro `clone_resetable` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (bd39bbb4b 2023-02-07) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=0 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `combine` ``` Backtrace is same as above...
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in Item(WithOptConstParam { did: DefId(0:3469 ~ combine[f3ba]::stream::{impl#47}::reset), const_param_did: None }) (after phase change to runtime-optimized) at bb0[2]: encountered `Assign((_0, const Result::<(), StringStreamError>::Ok(())))` with incompatible types: left-hand side has type: Result<(), <&str as StreamOnce>::Error> right-hand side has type: Result<(), StringStreamError> --> /Users/nick/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/combine-4.6.6/src/stream/mod.rs:44:17 | 44 | Ok(()) | ^^^^^^ ... 153 | clone_resetable! {('a) &'a str} | ------------------------------- in this macro invocation | = note: delayed at 0: std::backtrace::Backtrace::create 1: std::backtrace::Backtrace::force_capture 2: ::emit_diagnostic 3: ::delay_span_bug:: 4: ::fail:: 5: ::visit_statement 6: ::run_pass 7: rustc_mir_transform::pass_manager::run_passes_inner 8: rustc_mir_transform::optimized_mir 9: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 10: ::optimized_mir 11: ::encode_crate_root 12: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata_impl 13: rustc_data_structures::sync::join:: 14: rustc_metadata::rmeta::encoder::encode_metadata 15: rustc_metadata::fs::encode_and_write_metadata 16: rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen 17: ::enter::<::ongoing_codegen::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 18: ::ongoing_codegen 19: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 20: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> 21: >::set::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 22: std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 23: <::spawn_unchecked_, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>::{closure#1} as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once::{shim:vtable#0} 24: std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start 25: __pthread_start = note: this error: internal compiler error originates in the macro `clone_resetable` (in Nightly builds, run with -Z macro-backtrace for more info) note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (bd39bbb4b 2023-02-07) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=0 note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `combine` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... ```
